text.name: system_description
text.text: Toaplan was a Japanese video game developer headquartered in Tokyo, Japan. It is known for a large number of classic arcade titles, including Tiger-Heli, Flying Shark, Twin Cobra, Truxton, Zero Wing, Fire Shark, the Snow Bros. series, and more.
